titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Gilbert Pattisson, [16. 2. 1938]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Dear Gilbert, If I remember rightly this Cathedral was built, partly at least, by the Normans. Of course it's a long time ago & my memory isn't what it was then. My address is as follows:
I may need some money from you before long. So long! B....ly
